analysis.key_quote: I am opposing the new rule posed by the Office of Personnel Management, Docket ID: OPM-2025-0004, that would reclassify civil servants and make it easier to fire them.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and emphasizes the value and dedication of federal workers, highlighting concerns about their treatment and the implications of easier termination, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
